name: Studio-ContentDefinitions
description: Configures content definitions for studio site.
author: Etch UK

Settings.Description: Display collection of images or videos.
Collection of media items displayed in gallery.
Display news posts.
Display a paragraph of text.
Displays content defined with raw HTML.
Link to another page using a URL.
Represents a generic section of a page, i.e., a thematic grouping of content.
Display text as a heading.
Display an image.
Displays a bulleted list.
Display raw text.
Displays a numbered list.
Displays an image with a caption.
Display a quote from an individual or organisation.
Prominent section of page for sign posting to featured content.
Flexible content container.
Header section of site.
Embed content from another site (e.g. YouTube video, Google Maps, etc...).
Slideshow for cycling through a series of content.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Items included as slides within carousel.

Settings.Description: Use legacy visual editor for defining content.
Visual editor ideal for sections of large copy.
Footer section for the site.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Content to display within the footer.

Settings.Description: Group collection of widgets.
Display jobs.
Collection of fields for collecting information.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a customizable body for your content item.

Settings.Description: Display text to describe meaning of form field.
Interactive control used to enter information (text, checkbox, radio, etc...).
Multi-line plain-text editing control.
Drop down list for selecting from collection of options.
Collection of checkboxes for collecting toggleable information.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item.

Settings.Description: Collection of radio buttons for collecting single choice information.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item.

Settings.Description: Control used to submit form.
Display a summary of form validation issues
Display a validation issue for specific field.
Displays summary of content item being viewed with easy link to edit.
Displays a menu.
Display an image that can change at various screen sizes
Display collection of content in a tile grid.
Displays multiple content items sourced via a query.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item.

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides an editor for the common properties of a content item.
Provides a Liquid formatted body for your content item.
Provides rich text editor for curating content for body of content item.
Provides a way to add widgets per content items.
Provides a customizable body for your content item.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item.
Provides a way to define custom aliases for content items.
Create a collection of media items.
Provides a custom url for your content item.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides meta tags for your content item.
Provides an HTML Body for your content item.
Provides a way to define the url that is used to render your content item.
Add a list behavior.
Provides a Markdown formatted body for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior with the Content Picker for your content item.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Short description of thumbnail image for accessibility.

ContentPickerFieldSettings.Hint: Select other news items that will be displayed after content.

NumericFieldSettings.Hint: Number of news posts to display.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Display pagination controls for navigating through news posts.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Paging

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Control how content is aligned within section.
Determines the width of content within section.
Controls spacing after section.
Specify the amount of padding (internal space) on this component
Specify the amount of padding (internal space) on this section
Specify how much space to show between content when putting several items on the same line.
Control how content is vertically aligned within section.
Text to be displayed in link.
URL user is taken to when interacting with link.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Whether a new window is opened when user interacts with link.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Open in new Window

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Define appearance of link.
Text to be displayed in heading.
Importance of the heading, where the lower the value the more important the heading.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.
Caption displayed alongside image.
Control how images can be manipulated around text content.
Whether the background should be an image or a video embed.

ResponsiveMediaFieldSettings.Hint: Image displayed as background of hero.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: URL to third-party site that is hosting video (e.g. YouTube).
Specify how the content of the hero should be horizontally aligned
Specify how the hero content should be vertically aligned

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: By default, this component uses dark text. Tick this box to invert the colour and use light text.
Tick this to pull the hero up so that it goes behind the element above (e.g a transparent header)
Tick to add a gradient to the background media, which will make the header more legible

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Determines the width of content within section.
Specify how much space to show between content when putting several items on the same line.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.

ContentPickerFieldSettings.Hint: Main menu used by users to navigate the main sections of the site.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Label for button that's displayed on smaller devices to toggle the visibility of the main menu.
Default will display at the header at the top and disappear out of view when the user scrolls. Fixed will position header will always be visible, even when the visitor scrolls.
Label for button that's displayed on smaller devices to close the main menu.
URL to content that should be embedded (e.g. https://www.youtube.com/embed/TorVk3Hxm7Q).
Caption displayed to give description of embedded content.

NumericFieldSettings.Hint: Number of seconds each slide should display for. If set to "0", the slides won't automatically change.

ResponsiveMediaFieldSettings.Hint: Ensure all background images for each carousel item has the same dimensions to ensure the height of the carousel remains the same when changing the active item.

ContentPickerFieldSettings.Hint: Select a content item within the site that the user will be navigated to.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: If checked, the title will be rendered at top of the page.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Display Title

TextFieldSettings.Hint: A label that applies to all checkboxes, e.g "Which of these options do you enjoy? Select all that apply." (Optional)
Use hint text to provide additional context to the question (Optional)
Specify a unique ID for this item (Optional)
A label that applies to all radio buttons, e.g "Which of these options is your favourite?" (Optional)
Use hint text to provide additional context to the question (Optional)
Specify a unique ID for this item (Optional)

ContentPartSettings.Description: Turns your content item into a form.
Provides attributes common to all form elements.
Provides attributes common to all input form elements.
Provides label properties.
Provides input field properties.
Provides text area properties.
Provides select field properties.
Provides button properties.
Displays a validation summary.
Displays a field validation error.
When authorised, displays edit control for current page.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: URL user is navigated to when clicking image. If left blank, image won't be a hyperlink.
Specify how many columns to display the items in on desktop devices.

NumericFieldSettings.Hint: Number of items to display (per page, if paging is enabled)

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: By default, this widget displays the title and links in a header area. Tick this box to hide the header.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Specify how many columns to display the items in on desktop devices
